sentence.Network_en: I am an apothecary of that hospital.
sentence.Network_cn: 我是那家医院的一名药剂师.

sentence.Network_en: He was the usual cut and dry apothecary, of no particular age and color.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是那种再普通不过的行医者, 说不出多大年纪,相貌也没什么值得一提的.

sentence.Network_en: Apothecary: The availability of medicines makes the isle more orderly.
sentence.Network_cn: 药店: 有效的药品让岛上的人们感到有次序.

《Friends》词汇表B ... wrecking n. 失事, 遇难船, 打捞(或援救)业 apothecary n. 药剂师, 药师 via prep. 经, 通过, 经由.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : via Old French from late Latin apothecarius, from Latin apotheca, from Greek apothēkē 'storehouse'

entry.def: An apothecary was a person who prepared medicines for people.

means.word_mean: 1. a health professional trained in the art of preparing and dispensing drugs
